question: When the issue of formation of Visalandhra was raised in Hyderabad legislative assembly, how many members supported Visalandhra?
explanation:
Out of 174 members in Hyderabad legislative assembly 147 members expressed their views about Visalandhra. Of these
  • 103 supported Visalandhra
  • 29 wanted Telangana and
  • 15 remained neutral
